definitions.definition: An untrustworthy , despicable , or disreputable person, especially one suspected of being a criminal .
examples: They say all the lowlifes used to hang out at the docks and plot their despicable crimes, before being elected to public office.

definitions.definition: A person who is rebuked by their community for their behavior.
A person of low socio-economic status, especially due to their illicit background.

main_definition: ( derogatory ) An untrustworthy , despicable , or disreputable person, especially one suspected of being a criminal .
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) A person who is rebuked by their community for their behavior.
( derogatory ) A person of low socio-economic status, especially due to their illicit background.
